front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Application of Faulted Circuit Indicators for 200 / 600 A, Three-Phase Underground Distribution

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This Application Guide provides information on what a Faulted Circuit Indicator (FCI) is designed to do and describes methods for selecting FCIs for three-phase, 200 / 600 amp underground distribution circuits. This application guide will complement the existing single phase application guide.
